layer_has_instance: This function can be used to check if a given instance is currently assigned to the given layer. You supply the layer ID (which you get when you create the layer using layer_create()) or the layer name (as a string - this will have a performance impact) and the instance ID of the instance to check for. You can also give an object_index (ie: the name of the object in the Asset Browser) and the function will check if any instances of that object are on the given layer. The function will return true if the instance is on the layer and false if it is not.
